pageProps.title: Super Smash Bros. in esports - Wikipedia

children.value: Alok put me onto this. Extremely cool history of Melee in esports. Comptetitive play heavily involves taking advantage of implementation details of the gameboards and characters.

backlinks.title: Boluk, Stephanie and LeMieux, Patrick, Metagaming: Playing, Competing, Spectating, Cheating, Trading, Making, and Breaking Videogames
